security_audit.summary: This skill performs read-only operations on git status, Plans.md, and AGENTS.md files. It uses standard bash commands for environment checks and file size monitoring. No network activity, code execution, or sensitive data access detected.

low_findings.title: Shell command execution for git operations
low_findings.description: The skill executes shell commands including 'git status -sb' and 'git log --oneline -3' to retrieve repository information. While these are standard git commands, any shell execution carries inherent risks if input validation is insufficient.

low_findings.title: File system access to user home directory
low_findings.description: The skill checks for Claude-mem configuration by reading ~/.claude-mem/settings.json. This accesses the user's home directory which could contain sensitive configuration data.

content.value_statement: Start your coding sessions with a complete status overview. This skill automatically checks your git status, reviews pending tasks from Plans.md, and summarizes key information from AGENTS.md.
actual_capabilities: Displays current git branch and recent commits
Reads and summarizes Plans.md task status
Checks AGENTS.md for role assignments and restrictions
Monitors file sizes for Plans.md and session-log.md
Integrates with Claude-mem for context awareness
limitations: Read-only operations only - no file modifications
Requires existing Plans.md and AGENTS.md files
No network requests or external API calls

use_cases.title: Daily development session start
use_cases.description: Quickly understand your current work status, pending tasks, and project context when starting your coding day.

use_cases.title: Team status overview
use_cases.description: Get immediate visibility into ongoing tasks, team assignments, and project progress without manual file checking.

use_cases.title: Context switching aid
use_cases.description: Resume work seamlessly after breaks by instantly seeing where you left off and what needs attention.

faq.question: Is this compatible with all Claude Code versions?
faq.answer: Yes, it uses standard bash commands and file operations that work across all Claude Code versions.

faq.question: What are the file size limits?
faq.answer: Plans.md warns at 200+ lines, session-log.md at 500+ lines. These are suggestions, not hard limits.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with my existing workflow?
faq.answer: Yes, it reads standard files (Plans.md, AGENTS.md) and works with any git repository.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: The skill only reads files and performs git commands - no data is sent externally or modified.

faq.question: What if Plans.md doesn't exist?
faq.answer: The skill will note it's missing and suggest running /harness-init to create it.

faq.question: How does Claude-mem integration work?
faq.answer: If Claude-mem is configured in harness mode, it displays past context and session summaries automatically.
